Contributor: Welsh, H. Devitt, artist.; United States. Committee on Public Information, publisher.;
Note: Signed "H. Devitt Welsh." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that the messages from the government are from a theater which has been appointed by the government in Washington to receive these official messages. The privilege of its stage has been granted to the Four Minute Men. Illustration shows the Capital in Washington.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I

Title: 4 Minute Men
